name: Chicken Chow Mein with Almonds
ingredients: 1/2 medium onion, sliced in thick slices, 1 3/4 ounces
4 cups napa cabbage, sliced coarsely, 1 small head or about 1 pound
1/4 cup slivered almonds, lightly toasted, about 1 ounce
Xanthan gum to thicken the sauce, optional

instructions.en: Heat oil in skillet on medium-high. Cook onion, cabbage, celery and garlic until cabbage is wilted, 3 minutes.
Add Splenda, broth, water, soy sauce and sesame oil.
Stir in chicken and mushrooms (if using) and heat through.
Lightly sprinkle xanthan gum over sauce, stir in and cook until thickened.

notes: Makes about 6 servings. Freezing not recommended. Straw mushrooms are optional and not included in carb count.
